ext_descriptions.ext_description: The event_occurrence_item type is an extensible list of alternate entity data types. It provides a mechanism to refer to instances of the data types included in the types that extend the event_occurrence_item type. This empty extensible select type requires extension in a further module, to ensure that any entity data type that refers to it can have a valid instantiation.

The event_occurrence_date_item type is an extension of the date_item type. It adds the data type event_occurrence to the list of alternate data types. This select type provides the capability to associate a date to an event_occurrence. In the context of this application module, this enables to represent the start dates of an event.

The event_occurrence_date_and_time_item type is an extension of the date_and_time_item type. It adds the entity data type event_occurrence to the list of alternate data types. This select type provides the capability to associate date and time information to an event_occurrence. In the context of this application module, this enables to represent the start dates of an event.
An applied_event_occurrence_assignment is a type of event_occurrence_assignment that assigns an event_occurrence to an event_occurrence_item .
the set of items to which the event_occurrence is assigned.
